name: Adaptive Progression
effect: Negate target Elemental Attack. (An Elemental Attack is an attack with at least one Elemental Type. That attack deals no damage and has no other effects.)

name: Aichlyys Wisp
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 40 Wisdom and 5 Energy.
As ephemeral as dreams and just as cherished.

name: Aivenna, OverWorld Lieutenant
effect: C:60 P:65 W:90 S:35
1MC: Heal 5 damage to target Creature for each Tribe you control.
If you control only Aivenna and Nivenna, Aivenna has an additional 20 Energy and "Defender."
Unique

name: Akkalbi
effect: C:55 P:20 W:70 S:35
Reduce Recklessness damage dealt to Creatures you control by 10.
Brainwashed
Unique

name: Akkerbal
effect: C:60 P:30 W:75 S:55
While you control a Mipedian, the first attack against Akkerbal each combat deals 0 damage.
The M'arrillians were confused why Akkerbal hated them so much. Don't cactuses like water?

name: Alacritous Force
effect: Stat Check Power 60: Deal 10 damage.
Stat Check Speed 60: Deal 10 damage.

name: Anarkiar
effect: C:60 P:85 W:30 S:40
Outperform Power 5
Recklessness 10
While you control an OverWorlder, Recklessness damage dealt to Anarkiar is reduced to 0.

name: Armbands of Lore
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 40 Courage and 5 Energy.
"Total control and domination!? You are fools! Control is an illusion... and that is why you will fail."

name: Barath Beyond, UnderWorld General
effect: C:40 P:90 W:20 S:75
Sacrifice a Creature while Barath Beyond is engaged: If you sacrificed
• an OverWorlder, negate target Mugic.
• a Mipedian, the next attack played by Barath Beyond deals an additional 20 damage.
• a Danian, Barath Beyond gains 30 Energy.
Legendary

name: Blugon Winter Warrior
effect: C:60 P:40 W:75 S:45
2MC: Target attack counts as the first attack this combat.
Brainwashed

name: Bo'aam
effect: C:55 P:50 W:85 S:40
When Bo'aam becomes engaged, the opposing engaged Creature loses 5 Energy for each Elemental Type it doesn't have.
Just make one mistake, a single slight error... and your life is done.

name: Bodal's Dagger
effect: Equipped Creature deals an additional 10 damage with non-Elemental, non-Discipline Attacks. (An Elemental Attack is an attack with at least one Elemental Type. A Discipline Attack is an attack with at least one Stat Check, Challenge or Stat Fail.)

name: Braveglint
effect: Stat Check Courage 60: Deal 10 damage.
Stat Check Speed 60: Deal 10 damage.

name: Carnival of Confusion, Mind Games
effect: When a player would draw and play an Attack Card, instead they reveal and play the top card of their Attack Deck.
If I say I'm lying, am I telling the truth?

name: Chaor, The Fierce
effect: C:80 P:105 W:45 S:45
Fire 10
Unique, Loyal
Exiled from the UnderWorld, Chaor has lost his homeland and his throne. But his anger still rages, and it drives him forward.

name: Clashjet
effect: Stat Check Power 50: Deal 5 Damage.

name: Coral Balls
effect: If your engaged Creature has Defender, deal 10 damage.

name: Crown of Aa'une
effect: Equipped Creature has Creature Type "Chieftain" in addition to its other types. (Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)
Legendary, Loyal - M'arrillians or Minions
For true leaders, the crown does not define the king. The king defines the crown.

name: Cryomorph Barricades
effect: Creatures with Defender deal an additional 5 attack damage.
Mirage: Creatures in this space have "Defender."
Even Intress was flabbergasted that the Fluidmorphers built the wall in a day.

name: Denying Dirge
effect: Target Creature cannot be healed or gain Energy.
If you make sure the weak remain weak, the outcome will never be bleak.

name: Directed Bravery
effect: Stat Check Courage 60: Deal 10 damage.
Stat Check Wisdom 60: Deal 10 damage.

name: Discipline Destruction
effect: Challenge Courage 15: Deal 10 damage.
Challenge Power 15: Deal 10 damage.
Challenge Wisdom 15: Deal 10 damage.
Challenge Speed 15: Deal 10 damage.

name: Ebbikka
effect: C:50 P:35 W:65 S:85
Battlegear equipped to OverWorlders you control have "Untargetable."
Though master of countless Mipedian weapons, something about OverWorld craftsmanship resonates with her.

name: Elna
effect: C:85 P:55 W:45 S:45
While Elna is in your discard pile, at the beginning of combat, activate Hive.
The Cothica binds us all: the living and breathing with the dead and decaying.

name: Em'swa
effect: C:60 P:25 W:70 S:50
Fluidmorph
4MC: Target Creature loses an Elemental Type of your choice.
Loyal - M'arrillians or Minions
No one is happier than Em'swa that the Tribes have teamed up. Maybe they'll finally prove to be a challenge.

name: Fearless Strike
effect: Stat Check Courage 60: Deal 10 damage.
Stat Check Power 60: Deal 10 damage.

name: Fire Ring
effect: When you play Fire Ring, deal 10 non-attack damage to your engaged Creature.

name: Funnel Blast
effect: Stat Check Speed 50: Deal 5 Damage.

name: Gan'nim
effect: C:90 P:90 W:50 S:15
When a Creature engaged with Gan'nim fails a Stat Check or Challenge on an attack it played, Gan'nim deals 10 damage to it.
Gan'nim loves the squishy sounds he hears each time he steps on an enemy.

name: General's Standard
effect: When General's Standard is revealed, choose a Tribe. Equipped Creature is considered to belong to that Tribe while General's Standard is face-up. (This effect does not end at the end of the turn.)

name: Geyser Gush
effect: Stat Check Courage 50: Deal 5 Damage.

name: Ghar'lag
effect: C:40 P:35 W:65 S:75
Discard a Mugic Card: Opposing Creatures lose and cannot gain Range and Swift.
Unique, Loyal - M'arrillians or Minions
(Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)

name: Gigantroper
effect: At the beginning of combat, equipped Creature loses all abilities and gains or loses Courage, Power, Wisdom, Speed and Energy to make those values 70.
Unique

name: Glacier Plains, M'arrillian Heat Cannon
effect: Pay 50 Mugic counters among Creatures you control: Win the game. (Any player may play this ability.)
Unique
"If the ice melts, Perim will die. We must stop it... no matter what the sacrifice."

name: Glapaal
effect: C:50 P:25 W:60 S:40
1MC: Heal 10 damage to target engaged Mipedian and deal 10 damage to the opposing engaged Creature.
"Wamma says only fools rush into battle. In that case... call me a fool!?"

name: Gorram's Briefing
effect: At the beginning of combat, each player's engaged Creature gains 5 Energy and 5 to all Disciplines for each Tribe that player controls.
The beginning of the end begins.

name: Gorram, Danian General
effect: C:85 P:50 W:75 S:35
While your discard pile contains
• an OverWorlder, your Creatures have "Water 5."
• an UnderWorlder, your Creatures have "Fire 5."
• a Mipedian, your Creatures have "Air 5."
Legendary

name: Grantkae's Stance
effect: If you control
• an OverWorlder, gain 10 Energy.
• an UnderWorlder, destroy the opposing engaged Creature's Battlegear.
• a Mipedian, the next attack played this turn deals 10 less damage.
• a Danian, deal 10 damage.

name: Grantkae, Mipedian General
effect: C:50 P:50 W:65 S:85
On your turn, other Creatures you control have
• an additional 25 to all Disciplines if you control an OverWorlder.
• "Intimidate: Energy 10" if you control an UnderWorlder.
• "Waterproof 25" if you control a Danian.
Legendary

name: Gravel Grind
effect: Earth: When Gravel Grind deals damage, remove a card in a general discard pile from the game.

name: Heartsync
effect: Stat Check Courage 75: Look at the top two cards of your opponent's Attack Deck. Put one on top of that deck and the other on the bottom.

name: Hune Marquard, Brainwashed Scholar
effect: C:45 P:30 W:70 S:45
Danians you control may play OverWorld Mugic.
Brainwashed

name: Iflar's Improvisation
effect: Target non-Mipedian gains "Invisibility: Strike 30."
"A secret shared can never be unshared... but so be it."

name: Illusion Glissando
effect: Relocate target Mirage on the Battleboard to any space.
As they wandered from sand dune to sand dune in search of the Cothica, little did they know that the Cothica was never there to begin with.

name: Indigo Sash
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 40 Speed and 5 Energy.
"I never expected to see an UnderWorlder wearing the emblem of our noble Mipedian ancestors. And I've never been happier."

name: Inner Flood
effect: Water: Remove a Mugic counter from a Creature. If you do, another Creature of your choice controlled by the same player gains a Mugic counter.

name: Instantaneous Inspiration
effect: Stat Check Wisdom 60: Deal 10 damage.
Stat Check Speed 60: Deal 10 damage.

name: Interthink
effect: Stat Check Wisdom 75: You may choose a Creature. That Creature gains a Mugic counter.

name: Intertwined Melody
effect: Target Creature engaged with a non-UnderWorlder you control loses an Elemental Type of your choice and loses 30 to all Disciplines.
"I never thought an UnderWorlder would save my life. I owe you... unfortunately."

name: Jig of Reinforcement
effect: Target Creature gains
• 10 Energy if it's an OverWorlder.
• "Fire 5" if it's an UnderWorlder.
• 20 to all Disciplines if it's a Danian.
• "Invisibility: Strike 10" if it's a Mipedian.

name: Jorre, Mipedian Lieutenant
effect: C:40 P:30 W:25 S:80
1MC: Target Creature gains "Range" and "Swift X," where X is the number of Tribes you control.

At home on the battlefield, Jorre wishes the war would never end.

  • Number: 28
  • Rarity: Rare
  • Card Type: Creature
  • Tribe: Mipedian
  • Energy: 35
At home on the battlefield, Jorre wishes the war would never end.

name: Kamangareth, Unstable Ally
effect: C:55 P:80 W:45 S:60
While you control a Danian, unequipped Creatures you control have "Outperform Power 5."
Unique
Kamangareth has no problem fighting alongside former foes. The Danians are not as forgiving.

name: Kepiaan, Danian Lieutenant
effect: C:40 P:40 W:40 S:40
Kepiaan has an additional 10 Energy and 10 to all Disciplines for each Tribe you control.
Though hundreds of Danians perish to defeat a single Kha'rall, Kepiaan willingly accepts those losses.

name: Khorror
effect: C:100 P:100 W:15 S:100
Recklessness 50
Unique, Loyal
"I realize the battle is necessary, but this... this is too much. Even if we win the war, Perim is doomed."

name: Khybon's Mech-blade
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 40 Power and 5 Energy.
The handle hides a trigger that instantly doubles the length of the blade. Naturally, Khybon has not told anyone about this feature.

name: Klencka, Avenger
effect: C:90 P:60 W:60 S:40
While you control an OverWorlder, when Klencka deals damage with its first attack each combat, it gains Energy equal to the damage it dealt.

name: Lake Blakeer
effect: At the beginning of combat, engaged M'arrillians lose 10 Energy. Engaged M'arillians named Aa'une gain 20 Energy instead.
The legend forged here will last for generations.

name: Lake Morn, Globe Storm
effect: When Lake Morn becomes the active Location, flip a coin. If heads, Creatures with Water take an additional 5 attack damage. If tails, Creatures with Water take 5 less attack damage.

name: Loderool
effect: C:65 P:70 W:50 S:30
While you control an UnderWorlder, Loderool has "Fire 5."
"This alliance changes nothing! I've still never met an UnderWorlder that I liked!"

name: Lore, Ancestral Caller
effect: C:100 P:40 W:60 S:30
1MC: Deal 5 damage to the opposing engaged Creature and heal 5 damage to Lore.
If an opponent's Creature would go to the discard pile, remove it from the game and Lore gains a Mugic Counter instead.
Unique, Loyal

name: M'arrillian Pulse Beacons
effect: When M'arrillian Pulse Beacons becomes the active Location, flip all face-up Battlegear face-down.
The M'arrillians need not be present to make their presence felt.

name: Magmon, Retalliator
effect: C:55 P:85 W:15 S:30

Recklessness 5

name: Majjcan
effect: C:70 P:40 W:50 S:80

name: Masilbaat
effect: C:70 P:45 W:55 S:30

name: Massblink
effect: Stat Check Speed 75: You may swap the positions of two unengaged Creatures that are adjacent to each other.

name: Maxxor, Protector of Perim
effect: C:110 P:55 W:80 S:45
When Maxxor is dealt attack damage, it gains "Maxxor deals an additional 5 attack damage."
Unique, Loyal
"I don't just fight for the OverWorld! I fight for all of Perim!"

name: Mipedian Fulgurite
effect: Equipped Creature has "Air 10." At the end of any combat, destroy Mipedian Fulgurite.
The air crackled and sizzled, as did the enemy.

name: Monophone Mayhem
effect: Choose a Tribe. Creatures of that Tribe may not gain Mugic counters.
The Mugician's singing turned into screams. There will be no more music this day.

name: Muge's Tuningfork
effect: Equipped Creature may play Mugic from any Tribe you control.
This Battlegear begins the game face-up.
Unique
Though Mugicians may appear to love one tribe's music over another, the fact remains they they love all music equally.

name: Nivenna, UnderWorld Lieutenant
effect: C:45 P:50 W:80 S:60
2MC: Deal 5 damage to target Creature for each Tribe you control.
If you control only Nivenna and Aivenna, this ability costs 1 less Mugic counter to play.
Unique

name: Numin Voidland
effect: At the beginning of combat, engaged Creatures lose all Elemental Types and gain 10 Energy for each Elemental Type lost this way.
Nothing survives here, not even the M'arrillians themselves!

name: Ode to Obscurity
effect: Infect X Uninfected Creatures. If you control a non-Danian, Infect another X Uninfected Creatures.
Where most see the tragedies of war, the wise see opportunity.

name: Opus Opposed
effect: Heal 5 damage to target Creature for each Tribe you control.
One is none.

name: Ostinato of Oban'emre
effect: Target M'arrillian or Minion gains 10 Energy for each Minion in all discard piles.
Living in harsh waters, the M'arrillians learned to scrounge even the smallest shred to survive.

name: Powercut
effect: Stat Check Power 60: Deal 10 damage.
Lose 60 Power.

name: Pyrogenousist's Hearth
effect: At the beginning of combat, deal 10 damage to each engaged Creature with no Mugic counters.

name: Quarters of the Quartet
effect: While a player controls exactly four Tribes, that player's Creatures have "Untargetable by opponents."
Four minds, one heart, Perim forever.

name: Raquanni
effect: C:30 P:25 W:80 S:50
1MC: Target equipped Creature gains "Outperform Speed 5."

name: Riverland Moon
effect: When equipped Creature deals Water damage, it gains 10 to all Disciplines.

name: Shard of Solitude
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy.

"Another one? The M'arrillians have more shards than Van Bloot has feathers!"

name: Shinadd
effect: C:60 P:35 W:30 S:100

If Shinadd would become engaged on your turn, you may choose an UnderWorlder you control. If you do, Shinadd and the chosen UnderWorlder swap spaces, and the chosen UnderWorlder becomes engaged instead.

name: Sirocco
effect: Air: Flip a face-down Battlegear you control face-up.

name: Skysong Arpeggio
effect: Target Creature gains 30 Wisdom and "Outperform Wisdom 5."

name: Smartsmack
effect: Stat Check Power 60: Deal 10 damage.

effect: Stat Check Power 75: When Strengthening Bond deals damage, destroy target Battlegear.
